words.source: H518 conj. + conj. אִם 'if'; KJV 'and if', ESV 'but if', NASB 'but if'
H3986 Piel ptc. ms of מָאֵן 'to refuse'; KJV 'thou refuse', ESV 'you refuse', NASB 'you refuse'
H859 pers. pron. 2ms אַתָּה 'you'; KJV 'thou', ESV 'you', NASB 'you'
H7971 prep. l- + Piel inf. constr. of שָׁלַח 'to send, let go'; KJV 'to let them go', ESV 'to let them go', NASB 'to let them go'
H2009 interj. הִנֵּה 'behold, look'; KJV 'behold', ESV 'behold', NASB 'behold'
H595 pers. pron. 1cs אָנֹכִי 'I'; KJV 'I', ESV 'I', NASB 'I'
H5062 Qal ptc. ms of נָגַף 'to strike, smite'; KJV 'will smite', ESV 'will plague', NASB 'will smite'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English versions
H3605 n.ms constr. כֹּל 'all, every'; KJV 'all', ESV 'all', NASB 'all'
H1366 n.ms constr. + 2ms suff. גְּבוּל 'boundary, territory'; KJV 'thy borders', ESV 'your whole country', NASB 'your whole territory'
H6854 prep. b- + art. + n.fp צְפַרְדֵּעַ 'frog'; KJV 'with frogs', ESV 'with frogs', NASB 'with frogs'
